summary: This appears to be an email forwarding a CNN news article about the investigation into Jeffrey Epstein's associates. The email is dated August 13, 2019, shortly after Epstein's death, and is sent between legal professionals, indicating legal or media monitoring related to the case.

persons.name: Todd Wallace Blanche
persons.context: Appears as the recipient of an email with the subject 'continues to kill it', which forwards a CNN article about the Epstein investigation.

persons.name: Sean S. Buckley
persons.context: Appears as a sender or recipient on the email chain forwarding a CNN article about the Epstein investigation.

persons.context: Appears as a recipient (via 'Esq.' title) of an email forwarding a CNN article about the Epstein investigation.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: The subject of the forwarded CNN news article regarding the investigation into his associates.

events.title: CNN publishes article on Epstein associates investigation

events.title: Email forwarding CNN article
events.description: An email with the subject 'continues to kill it' is sent, forwarding a CNN article about the investigation into Jeffrey Epstein's associates.

keyFacts: The document is an email dated August 13, 2019, forwarding a CNN article from August 12, 2019, about the investigation into Jeffrey Epstein's associates.
The email involves legal professionals (Todd Wallace Blanche, Sean S. Buckley, John Peter Cronan), suggesting legal or media monitoring activity related to the Epstein case.
The email subject 'continues to kill it' may refer to ongoing media coverage or developments in the Epstein investigation following his death.
